ProjectOverview.pageDescription: Overview of project details and associated plans
ProjectOverview.fundingCount: {count, plural, =0 {0 funding sources} one {1 funding source} other {{count} funding sources}}
ProjectOverview.memberCount: {count, plural, =0 {0 team members} one {1 team member} other {{count} team members}}
ProjectOverview.outputCount: {count, plural, =0 {0 outputs} one {1 output} other {{count} outputs}}

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: {total, plural, =0 {0 collaborators} one {1 collaborator} other {{total} collaborators}}

ProjectsListPage.intro: Manage your data management plans and projects. To create a new plan within the same research project, open the project below first and then create a new plan within it.

errors.errorRetrievingProjects: Something went wrong with retrieving projects. Please try again later.

ProjectsCreateProject.description: We'll start with asking for details about your research project so we can help you create the right data management plan for it. You can then add additional plans to the same project.

form.projectTitle: What is the title of the research project for this DMP?
form.projectTitleHelpText: You can change this at any time. If you already applied for funding, we recommend using the formal project title for consistency and to help find details in funder databases.
form.radioGroupLabel: Is this a mock project for testing purposes or a real project?

errors.titleLength: Name must be at least 2 characters long.
errors.title: Project title is required

descriptions.mockProject: For testing/educational purposes: cannot request feedback or publish plan, excluded from statistics.
descriptions.realProject: Full functionality. Cannot be changed back to Mock project.

ProjectsCreateProjectFunding.title: Do you already have funding for this project?

form.radioFundingLabel: Do you already have funding for this project?
form.radioFundingDescription: You can update or remove all of this later, so don't worry if you are still waiting on final details or an award number.
form.radioYesDescription: We'll help you link the project to a funder now. You'll be able to select a funder and, if available, we'll pull in relevant details. Everything can be reviewed or changed later.
form.radioNoDescription: You can still proceed. If you receive funding later, you'll be able to link it to this project.

ProjectsProjectDetail.title: Project Details
ProjectsProjectDetail.description: Enter your Project Details, then hit Save below

helpText.childDropdownUpdated: Subdomain dropdown updated with {childOptionsList} options for {selectedParent}.

descriptions.mockProject: For testing/educational purposes: cannot request feedback or publish plan, excluded from statistics.
descriptions.realProject: Full functionality. Cannot be changed back to Mock project.

paragraphs.para1: Have a grant already? Not the right project? Use Search projects to find the project. If found key information will be filled in for you.

headings.h2MockProject: This project is mock project for testing, practice, or educational purposes

ProjectsProjectFundingEdit.title: Edit Funding Details
ProjectsProjectFundingEdit.para1Delete: This funder will be deleted. It will be removed from your list and is not reversible.
ProjectsProjectFundingEdit.para2Delete: Deleting the funder and funding information will be deleted from all your plans.

ProjectsProjectFundingAdd.title: Add Funding Details
ProjectsProjectFundingAdd.description: Manually add a new funding source

ProjectsProjectMembers.title: Project Members
ProjectsProjectMembers.description: Define contributors and team members and their role in this project.

headings.h2AllowCollaborators: Allow collaborators edit or comment access?

para.para1AllowCollaborators: You can invite people to access, edit or comment on plans by using the "<shareWithPeople>share with people</shareWithPeople>" button.

paragraphs.removeMember: Removing this member means they will no longer be able to access this plan. This is not reversible.
paragraphs.modalInfo: Please note that if you remove this project member, the member will also be removed from any associated plans. Also, if this is the only member under the project, it cannot be deleted.

errors.projectRoles: Must select at least one project role
errors.removingMember: An error occurred while removing the project member.
errors.updatingMember: An error occurred while updating the project member.

labels.checkboxGroupDescription: Provide the role(s) of the project member

ProjectsProjectCollaborationInvite.title: Who should have access to this project?

access.label: What should this person be able to do?

ProjectsProjectCollaborationInvite.para1: When you click Grant access we'll send an email to this person inviting them to view your plan.
ProjectsProjectCollaborationInvite.para2: If they aren't already a member of the DMP Tool we'll invite them to join.
ProjectsProjectCollaborationInvite.para3: We have sent an invite to {email}. They will have access to this project.
ProjectsProjectCollaborationInvite.para4: To also add them as a Project Member, <projectmember> go to the Project Members page </projectmember>.
ProjectsProjectCollaborationInvite.para5: They will have access to {access} DMPs in this project.

errors.email: Please enter a valid email address

ProjectsProjectCollaboration.title: Invite people and manage access
ProjectsProjectCollaboration.description: When you invite a person, we'll send an email to this person inviting them to view your plan.
ProjectsProjectCollaboration.removeCollaborator: Removing this member means they will no longer be able to collaborate on this plan.

headings.hasAccess: These people currently have access to this plan
headings.pendingInvites: These people have not accepted invite yet

ProjectsProjectMembersSearch.title: Add project member
ProjectsProjectMembersSearch.description: If you know a person's full 16 character ORCiD, enter it below and use the Lookup button to associate them with this project. If you don't know their ORCiD, just enter their info below.
ProjectsProjectMembersSearch.searchDescription: If known, enter project member's full 16 character ORCiD in the format XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX  or ORCiD URL, and click Lookup. Otherwise, complete the information below manually.

messaging.noSearchResultsFound: No record associated with that ORCiD was found. Please check the ORCiD and try again.

errors.failedToAddProjectMember: Failed to add member. Please try again.
errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
errors.projectRolesRequired: At least one project role must be selected
errors.searchTermRequired: Please enter an ORCiD or a URL containing an ORCiD to search
errors.valueOrcidRequired: Please enter a valid ORCiD in the format XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX or a URL containing an ORCiD

labels.definedRole: Define member's role(s) in this project

ProjectsProjectMembersSearch.memberRolesDescription:
Select the role(s) that should be displayed within citations for this project member with the DMP.

We use an ANSI/NISO standard called CRediT, a community-owned 14 role taxonomy that can be used to describe the key types of contributions typically made to the production and publication of research output such as research articles.

Learn more about CRediT Taxonomy â†—

ProjectsProjectMemberCreate.title: Add a new project member
ProjectsProjectMemberCreate.description: Add a new member to this project by filling in their details below.
